post:
Hi there, 
Since i have been re purposing a lot of Servers etc, optimizing code and reducing costs i have a Few VM's that are Unused and looking to sell them off.

They are as listed. 
<pre>
1) Yourserver.se - 1vCPU/256MB/5GB SSD/Unmetered Transfer
Gothenburg, Sweden 27.07.2015 - Renewal Price 14&euro;/yr

2) Yourserver.se - 1vCPU/256MB/5GB SSD/Unmetered Transfer
Riga, Latvia - Expires: 21.07.2015 - Renewal Price 14&euro;/yr

3) INIZ - 1vCPU/256MB/128MB/25GB HDD/500GB Transfer
New York, USA - Expires: 28/07/2015 - Renewal Price $14.45USD/yr

4) GinerNet - 1vCPU/512MB/256MB/5GB SSD/100GB Transfer
Madrid, ES - Expires: 14/07/2015 - Renewal Price 9.99&euro;/yr

all 3 Providers have said it is ok to Transfer, can provide proof of this if needed. 

I will do this in an Auction format.
So you may get an great deal :)

Starting Bid: 1 USD 
Increments: 0.50 USD

Payment VIA PayPal Gift or you pay fees. 

Auction will end 23Hrs and 59 minutes from the Time of this post
